    • Constructor Detail

      • AmqpsConnection

        public AmqpsConnection(String hostName,
                       AmqpDeviceOperations amqpDeviceOperations,
                       SSLContext sslContext,
                       boolean useSasl,
                       boolean useWebSockets)
                throws IOException
        Constructor for the Amqp library
        Parameters:
        hostName - Name of the AMQP Endpoint
        amqpDeviceOperations - Object holding details of the links used in this connection
        sslContext - SSL Context to be set over TLS.
        useSasl - SASL to be used or disabled
        useWebSockets - WebSockets to be used or disabled.
        Throws:
        IOException - This exception is thrown if for any reason constructor cannot succeed.

      • onLinkRemoteClose

        public void onLinkRemoteClose(org.apache.qpid.proton.engine.Event event)
        Event handler for the link remote close event. This triggers reconnection attempts until successful. Both sender and receiver links closing trigger this event, so we only handle one of them, since the other is redundant.
        Specified by:
        onLinkRemoteClose in interface org.apache.qpid.proton.engine.CoreHandler
        Overrides:
        onLinkRemoteClose in class org.apache.qpid.proton.engine.BaseHandler
        Parameters:
        event - The Proton Event object.

      • onTransportError

        public void onTransportError(org.apache.qpid.proton.engine.Event event)
        Event handler for the transport error event. This triggers reconnection attempts until successful.
        Specified by:
        onTransportError in interface org.apache.qpid.proton.engine.CoreHandler
        Overrides:
        onTransportError in class org.apache.qpid.proton.engine.BaseHandler
